title: How to Find the Kino Der Toten Easter Egg

steps.title: In the lobby (Where you spawn at the beginning of the game or when you come back from the teleporter) Near the back, there should be 2 banners with swastikas.
steps.content: In the lobby (Where you spawn at the beginning of the game or when you come back from the teleporter) Near the back, there should be 2 banners with swastikas. At the back of the banner on the right, there will be a round box with red glowing rocks. Approach the rocks and hold X/Square to pick up.

steps.title: In the dressing room next to the theater (The room with the MP5K) Just behind the wall with the MP5K, there will be a glowing red rock on the table.
steps.content: In the dressing room next to the theater (The room with the MP5K) Just behind the wall with the MP5K, there will be a glowing red rock on the table. Pick this up.

steps.title: In the room that can be accessed by both the Alley and by going into the theatre and buying the door next to the M16, at the back of the room next to the barriers, there will be a shelf with a couple of tools on it, and the last rock.
steps.content: In the room that can be accessed by both the Alley and by going into the theatre and buying the door next to the M16, at the back of the room next to the barriers, there will be a shelf with a couple of tools on it, and the last rock. Once picked up, a Heavy Metal sound will start to play. (The song is 115 by Elena Siegman)
